title: BC切换子服务器报错
author: 利姆露酱
txt_content:
disconnected with: Could not connect to a default or fallback server, please try again later: io.netty.channel.unix.Errors$NativeIoException

有几率碰到

linux服务器

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
BC是否有更完整的错误信息
连接的两个服务器 以及客户端呢

replies.author: 利姆露酱
replies.txt_content:
GiNYAi 发表于 2020-4-3 12:15
BC是否有更完整的错误信息
连接的两个服务器 以及客户端呢
[12:48:45] [Server thread/INFO]: dantou lost connection: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: Error while read(...): Connection reset by peer

replies.txt_content:
利姆露酱 发表于 2020-4-3 13:03
[12:48:45] [Server thread/INFO]: dantou lost connection: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException:  ...
那么 服务器端  或者客户端有其它的信息么

replies.txt_content:

玩家
disconnected with: Could not connect to a default or fallback server, please try again later: io.netty.channel.unix.Errors$NativeIoException

无，服务端bc
disconnected with: Could not connect to a default or fallback server, please try agai ...
看起来像是bc和 子服直接的连接 出现了网络层面的问题
本地回环还会出错么
